examples.title: Assume an IAM role that requires an MFA token with AWS STS using an AWS SDK
examples.title_abbrev: Assume an IAM role that requires an MFA token
examples.synopsis: assume a role that requires an MFA token.
synopsis_list: Create an IAM role that grants permission to list Amazon S3 buckets.
Create an IAM user that has permission to assume the role only when MFA credentials are provided.
Register an MFA device for the user.
Assume the role and use temporary credentials to list S3 buckets.

examples.title: Construct a URL with AWS STS for federated users using an AWS SDK
examples.title_abbrev: Construct a URL for federated users
synopsis_list: Create an IAM role that grants read-only access to the current account's Amazon S3 resources.
Get a security token from the AWS federation endpoint.
Construct a URL that can be used to access the console with federated credentials.

examples.title: Get a session token that requires an MFA token with AWS STS using an AWS SDK
examples.title_abbrev: Get a session token that requires an MFA token
examples.synopsis: get a session token that requires an MFA token.
synopsis_list: Create an IAM role that grants permission to list Amazon S3 buckets.
Create an IAM user that has permission to assume the role only when MFA credentials are provided.
Register an MFA device for the user.
Provide MFA credentials to get a session token and use temporary credentials to list S3 buckets.
